ai-tika-vin09t11:1_0: Firstly, a second robe belonging to the Sangha is expected to be relinquished. They don’t make a robe in the Monastic Law.
ai-tika-vin09t11:2_0: In the third (story), “Amongst those who steal from stealing is untouchable.”
ai-tika-vin09t11:3_0: The fourth enclosed bowl belonging to one cow and having obtained it, it is to be relinquished.
ai-tika-vin09t11:4_0: The commentary on relinquishment is finished.
